inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed stage IV squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity or oropharynx staged according to AJCC guidelines
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: T4 staged tumor with a tumor volume greater than or equal to 30 cc
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of distant metastatic disease, as determined by a negative PET scan or other clinically appropriate means
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinically eligible for both intra-arterial and intravenous administration of cisplatin
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to use adequate contraception prior to study entry and for the duration of study participation and for 3 months after study treatment ended
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 5 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Tumor with involvement of cartilage or bone
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Requires bilateral IA infusion with radiologist determination that tumor extends across the midline in excess of 30% of the tumor volume
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, which is not a squamous cell carcinoma. They also have a history of surgery and radiation therapy, which may make them ineligible for the study.
